bcbioRNASeq
  • Reference

Count Matrix Accessors

By default, counts() returns the raw counts. Normalized counts, including transcripts per million (TPM) can be accessed using the normalized argument.

# S4 method for bcbioRNADataSet
counts(object, normalized = FALSE)

Arguments

object

Object.
normalized

Select raw counts (FALSE), DESeq2 normalized counts (TRUE), or additional normalization methods:

  • tpm: Transcripts per million.

  • tmm: Trimmed mean of M-values (edgeR).

  • rlog: Regularized log transformation (DESeq2::rlog()).

  • vst: Variance stabilizing transformation (DESeq2::varianceStabilizingTransformation()).

Value

matrix.

Examples

data(bcb)
# Raw counts
counts(bcb, normalized = FALSE) %>% glimpse
#>  num [1:505, 1:4] 11.611 399.73 1712.747 677.519 0.999 ...
#>  - attr(*, "dimnames")=List of 2
#>   ..$ : chr [1:505] "ENSMUSG00000002459" "ENSMUSG00000004768" "ENSMUSG00000005886" "ENSMUSG00000016918" ...
#>   ..$ : chr [1:4] "group1_1" "group1_2" "group2_1" "group2_2"

# DESeq2 normalized counts
counts(bcb, normalized = TRUE) %>% glimpse
#>  num [1:505, 1:4] 13.2 440 1884.4 745.8 1.1 ...
#>  - attr(*, "dimnames")=List of 2
#>   ..$ : chr [1:505] "ENSMUSG00000002459" "ENSMUSG00000004768" "ENSMUSG00000005886" "ENSMUSG00000016918" ...
#>   ..$ : chr [1:4] "group1_1" "group1_2" "group2_1" "group2_2"

# TPM
counts(bcb, normalized = "tpm") %>% glimpse
#>  num [1:505, 1:4] 0.3396 5.7356 8.6836 7.005 0.0392 ...
#>  - attr(*, "dimnames")=List of 2
#>   ..$ : chr [1:505] "ENSMUSG00000002459" "ENSMUSG00000004768" "ENSMUSG00000005886" "ENSMUSG00000016918" ...
#>   ..$ : chr [1:4] "group1_1" "group1_2" "group2_1" "group2_2"

# TMM
counts(bcb, normalized = "tmm") %>% glimpse
#>  num [1:505, 1:4] 28.63 985.7 4223.48 1670.7 2.46 ...
#>  - attr(*, "dimnames")=List of 2
#>   ..$ : chr [1:505] "ENSMUSG00000002459" "ENSMUSG00000004768" "ENSMUSG00000005886" "ENSMUSG00000016918" ...
#>   ..$ : chr [1:4] "group1_1" "group1_2" "group2_1" "group2_2"

# rlog
counts(bcb, normalized = "rlog") %>% glimpse
#>  num [1:505, 1:4] 3.42 8.67 10.85 9.37 -1.71 ...
#>  - attr(*, "dimnames")=List of 2
#>   ..$ : chr [1:505] "ENSMUSG00000002459" "ENSMUSG00000004768" "ENSMUSG00000005886" "ENSMUSG00000016918" ...
#>   ..$ : chr [1:4] "group1_1" "group1_2" "group2_1" "group2_2"
#>  - attr(*, "betaPriorVar")= num 0.184
#>  - attr(*, "intercept")= num [1:505, 1] 3.36 8.42 10.76 8.93 -1.72 ...

# VST
counts(bcb, normalized = "vst") %>% glimpse
#>  num [1:505, 1:4] 6.45 9.08 10.96 9.73 5.95 ...
#>  - attr(*, "dimnames")=List of 2
#>   ..$ : chr [1:505] "ENSMUSG00000002459" "ENSMUSG00000004768" "ENSMUSG00000005886" "ENSMUSG00000016918" ...
#>   ..$ : chr [1:4] "group1_1" "group1_2" "group2_1" "group2_2"
